mapper.select: select chw.id, chw.cloud_host_config_model_id, chw.name, chw.total_amount, chw.remain_amount, chw.create_time, chw.modify_time, chw.assigned_amount, chw.check_time, chw.pool_id, chw.minimum, chcm.sys_image_name sysImageName, chcm.name hostTypeName from cloud_host_warehouse chw left join cloud_host_config_model chcm on chw.cloud_host_config_model_id = chcm.id order by chw.modify_time desc

select chw.id, chw.cloud_host_config_model_id, chw.name, chw.total_amount, chw.remain_amount, chw.create_time, chw.modify_time, chw.check_time, chw.minimum, chw.pool_id, chw.assigned_amount, chcm.sys_image_name sysImageName, chcm.name hostTypeName from cloud_host_warehouse chw left join cloud_host_config_model chcm on chw.cloud_host_config_model_id = chcm.id where chw.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update cloud_host_warehouse a SET a.total_amount = (select count(*) from cloud_host b where b.warehouse_id= a.id) , a.remain_amount = (select count(*) from cloud_host b where b.warehouse_id= a.id and real_host_id is not null and user_id is null), a.assigned_amount = (select count(*) from cloud_host b where b.warehouse_id= a.id and real_host_id is not null and user_id is not null) where a.id = #{id}
